title: ENDS_WITH
description: Returns TRUE if the provided string ends with any of the specified compare_strings. The comparison is case-sensitive. Otherwise, returns FALSE.

parameters.name: â€¦ compare_string
parameters.description: One or more strings to compare against the end of the source string.

examples:
ENDS_WITH(Website, ".org")
-- Returns TRUE if the Website ends with ".org"; otherwise, returns FALSE.
